title: View and customize execution log in Katalon Studio
description: Viewing the execution log is the very first approach when   troubleshooting automation test execution. The critical information   in the log can quickly help project teams pinpoint the root causes   of any issues. Katalon Studio execution logs are optimized to   provide such information so that you can have a comprehensive view   of the tests run.

frontMatter.title: View and customize execution log in Katalon Studio
